text: @realDonaldTrump Well I stopped counting your failures already 2 months after you were elected, so during the period so far it is probably around 100+ failures, including major ones like impeachment, failure to stop Covid-19 in time, ”Rocket-man” is still around with nukes, greenhouse effect, ...
